title: Radioactive
lyrics:
[intro] (Am)  (C)  (G)  (D)
 
(Am) I'm waking up (C) to ash and dust
(G) I wipe my brow (D) and I sweat my rust
(Am) I'm breathing in (C) the chemicals (G)  (D)
 
(Am) I'm breaking in, (C) shaping up
(G) Then checking out (D) on the prison bus
(Am) This is it, (C) the apocalypse (G)  (D)
 
[chorus]
I'm waking (Am)up, I feel it (C)in my bones
E(G)nough to make my (D)system grow
(Am)Welcome to the new age, (C) to the new age
(G)Welcome to the new age, (D) to the new age
(Am) Whoa (C) whoa, I'm (G) radioactive, (D) radioactive
(Am) Whoa (C) whoa, I'm (G) radioactive, (D) radioactive
 
(Am) I raise my flags, (C) dye my clothes
(G) It's a revo(D)lution, I suppose
(Am) We're painted red (C) to fit right in (G) (D)
 
(Am) I'm breaking in, (C) shaping up,
(G) Then checking out (D) on the prison bus
(Am) This is it, (C) the apocalypse (G) (D)
 
[chorus]
I'm waking (Am)up, I feel it (C)in my bones
E(G)nough to make my (D)system grow
(Am)Welcome to the new age, (C) to the new age
(G)Welcome to the new age, (D) to the new age
(Am) Whoa (C) whoa, I'm (G) radioactive, (D) radioactive
(Am) Whoa (C) whoa, I'm (G) radioactive, (D) radioactive
 
[bridge-single strum]
(Am)All systems (G)go, the (G)sun hasn't (D)died
(Am)Deep in my (G)bones, (G)straight from in(D)side
 
[chorus]
I'm waking (Am)up, I feel it (C)in my bones
E(G)nough to make my (D)system grow
(Am)Welcome to the new age, (C) to the new age
(G)Welcome to the new age, (D) to the new age
(Am) Whoa (C) whoa, I'm (G) radioactive, (D) radioactive
(Am) Whoa (C) whoa, I'm (G) radioactive, (D) radioactive
(Am-single strum) [end]
